front.title: American National Standard for RF Immunity of Audio Office Equipment to General Use Transmitting Devices With Transmitter Power Levels up to 8 Watts

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.keyword: audio interference, EMI, immunity, interference, office equipment, RF, RFI susceptibility
front.abstract: This standard provides recommended test methods and limits for assuring the radio frequency (RF) immunity of office equipment to general use transmitters with transmitter power up to 8 watts.
